PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-14582014-12-12,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActCanadian International Trade Tribunal Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN INTERNATIONAL TRADE TRIBUNAL PROCUREMENT INQUIRY REGULATIONS in order to reflect the inclusion of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement so that the Regulations will apply to inquiries related to procurement bids involving the Republic of Korea.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0303 Publication Date: 2014-12-31
AttachmentsAttachment
